Computer.name: Drek's Battlestation

eosDevice.name: Drek's ePhone 6
eosDevice.note: Note filenames Note filenames are generated automatically by taking the first line of the file (in this case "Note Filenames") and replacing spaces with underscores.
eosDevice.file: This is mostly useful for jailbroken phones

Computer.file: If you've managed to break into my battlestation then CONGRATULATIONS! I can trace you now. Let this be a warning to you, don't mess with Drek the Hacker!
